heroSubtitle: Your smart farming companion. We provide AI-powered insights, real-time weather data, and a community hub to help you grow smarter and more efficiently.
featuresSubtitle: Krishi Setu integrates cutting-edge technology to provide you with the tools you need for modern agriculture.
feature1Desc: From crop recommendations and disease detection to market price predictions, our AI is here to help you make smarter decisions.
feature2Desc: Manage your farm's finances with our easy-to-use digital ledger. Track income and expenses to understand your profitability.
feature3Desc: Connect with a community of fellow farmers. Ask questions, share your experiences, and learn from others.
dashboardSubtitle: Here's an overview of your farm's status and today's forecast.
noFarmRegisteredDesc: Register your farm to get started with personalized insights and recommendations.
myFarmDesc: Details of your largest registered farm.
addFarmDesc: Follow the steps to add your farm details.
editFarmDesc: Follow the steps to update your farm details.
step1Desc: Provide basic information about your farm.
step3Desc: Add links to photos of your farm.
mustBeLoggedInToRegister: You must be logged in to register a farm.
farmUpdatedDesc: Your farm details have been successfully updated.
registrationCompleteDesc: Your farm has been successfully registered.
couldNotSaveFarm: Could not save your farm details. Please try again.
whatsNextDesc: You can view your updated farm details on your profile or explore the dashboard.
mapViewAvailable: Map view will be available here.
myProfileDesc: View and manage your account and farm details.
profileUpdatedDesc: Your profile has been successfully updated.
passwordChangedDesc: Your password has been successfully updated.
registeredFarmsDesc: View and manage all your registered farms.
noFarmsRegistered: You have not registered any farms yet.
myCultivationGuidesDesc: All your saved crop plans in one place.
noGuidesFoundDesc: You haven't created any cultivation guides yet.
deleteGuideConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the guide for "{crop}"? This action cannot be undone.
guideDeletedDesc: The cultivation guide for "{crop}" has been removed.
couldNotDeleteGuide: Could not delete the guide. Please try again.
newCultivationGuideDesc: Agronomy-powered, stage-wise planning for your crops.
generatingYourGuideDesc: Our AI is creating a personalized cultivation plan for your {crop} crop. This may take a moment...
createNewCultivationPlanDesc: Provide details about your crop to generate a personalized guide.
selectVarietyPlaceholder: Select a variety or let AI recommend
varietyPlaceholder: e.g., Pioneer P1197 (or leave blank for AI)
currentWeatherPlaceholder: Describe the current weather conditions, e.g., 'Sunny, 30°C, high humidity'
soilHealthPlaceholder: Describe your soil, e.g., 'pH 6.5, good nitrogen, low potassium. Or, upload a soil card.'
mustBeLoggedInToCreateGuide: You must be logged in to create a guide.
guideCreatedDesc: Your cultivation plan for {crop} has been saved to "My Guides".
failedToGenerateGuide: Failed to generate the cultivation guide. Please try again.
cultivationStagesDesc: Track your progress through each stage of cultivation.
cultivationCompleteDesc: Congratulations! You have completed all stages for this crop.
completeStageAndNext: Mark Current Stage as Complete & Move to Next
guideNotFoundDesc: The cultivation guide you are looking for does not exist or has been deleted.
stageUpdatedDesc: The status of your cultivation stages has been saved.
couldNotUpdateGuide: Could not update the guide. Please try again.
krishiKhataSubtitle: Your digital ledger for tracking farm finances.
transactionHistoryDesc: A record of all your income and expenses.
addNewTransactionDesc: Record a new income or expense to keep your ledger up to date.
aiCropToolsDesc: Get expert advice on what to plant next or ask general farming questions.
generalAgriBotDesc: Ask any general agricultural question, from soil types to crop varieties.
generalQuestionPlaceholder: e.g., "Which soil is suitable for soybean?" or "What are the crop varieties of Corn ?"
micNotSupported: Sorry, your browser doesn't support microphone access.
couldNotTranscribe: Could not transcribe audio. Please try again.
micAccessError: Could not access the microphone. Please check permissions and try again.
micPermissionDenied: Microphone permission was denied. Please allow it in your browser settings.
micNotFound: No microphone was found. Please ensure one is connected and enabled.
micUnavailableDesc: The browser could not access your microphone. Please close other apps or tabs using it, check permissions, then refresh the page.
failedToGetAnswer: Failed to get an answer. Please try again.
specificCropRecommendationDesc: Enter the latest data from your farm to receive tailored crop recommendations and save the report.
soilAnalysisPlaceholder: e.g., pH: 6.8, Nitrogen: High, Phosphorus: Medium, Potassium: Low, Organic Matter: 3.5%
weatherConditionsPlaceholder: e.g., Temp: 25°C, Humidity: 70%, Wind: 10km/h, Last rainfall: 2 days ago
seasonalDataPlaceholder: e.g., Current season: Late Spring, Average rainfall for this period: 50mm
clickToUploadSoilCard: Click to upload your Soil Health Card
failedToExtractInfo: Failed to extract information from image. Please try again or enter details manually.
mandiPricePredictionDesc: Get forecasts based on data from well-known agricultural market websites.
getPricePredictionDesc: Enter a crop and market to get a forecast from our market analyst.
failedToGetPrediction: Failed to get a price prediction. The model might be busy. Please try again.
fillCropAndMarket: Please fill in both crop name and market location.
trendConfidenceDesc: Confidence level for each potential price trend.
predictionDisclaimer: This generated prediction is for informational purposes only and is not financial advice. Market conditions can change rapidly.
weatherForecastDesc: Current conditions and 7-day outlook for your location.
